page.title: 14GENERAL DESCRIPTION
page.content: This block contains a part of the town of Flint known as Cornist. Cornist consists of a series of housing estates which have been built during the past 15 years. There are few shops or amenities, some of the houses are private and a large minority are corporation houses. Flint Industrial Estate lies between Cornist and the River Dee. The Estate is fairly new and for the most part consists of small factory units. There is one large factory, Kimberley Clark, but this is highly mechanized and employs few local people. Some of the factory units were built on the site of the demolished textile mills. Much of the rest of the block is sparsely populated mixed farmland. Part of the small village of Bagillt is in the block, this is mostly housing estates.
